# Introduction to the `ji` function 

The `ji` function is a key feature of the R language. It is a command that can be used to interpolate strings, making it a great tool for formatting text and data.

## What package contains it 

The `ji` function lives in the `stringr` package. It was designed to facilitate working with strings in R and has become an invaluable tool in data wrangling.
